value.name: Moment heroic officer gets shot, then fires back at fugitive drug dealer who killed a cop
value.description: Omar Felix Cueva, 39, stepped out of his pick-up truck on February 4 east of Deming, New Mexico with an AR-15-style rifle and killed Officer Darian Jarrott with 11 shots. He fled the scene and a 4 ...

value.name: Mayor honors Las Cruces police officer who took down highway cop killer
value.description: Drone video obtained by ABC-7 of the incident showed De La Garza taking a bullet from drug trafficker Omar Felix Cueva before returning fire, striking and killing the suspect. Authorities said ...

value.name: VIDEO: Lapel video shows moment Las Cruces Police Officer puts life on line to stop killer

value.name: New Mexico police officer gets up, fires back after shot by accused cop killer, video shows
value.description: De La Garza is seen shot by suspect Omar Felix Cueva and falling to the ground, but he quickly gets up and continues firing at Cueva until he reaches the suspect's car. Cueva was killed during the shootout with officers. In the video, fellow officers ...
